website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a basic, portable iPod and iPhone speaker that is exceptionally easy to use, the Philips SBD 7500 is a solid choice for less than $100.
pros: The Philips SBD 7500 is a simple and elegant portable speaker that is compatible with the iPod or iPhone and offers beefy sound for its price
cons: The speaker is light on features, lacking extras such as FM radio, remote control, and Bluetooth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, perfect size, very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I had an iHome speaker dock like this and it just puked one day. Finding 30-Pin options has been getting tougher and tougher but thankfully I found this Philips unit. So far I'm very happy with it. For the size it puts out impressive sound including decent bass. I use it in my office for background/ambiance and it's been excellent so far. A few small issues... The docking connection is a little stiff and the power button is hard to slide. Frankly, these are small issues. Overall I'm very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan S.

customer_reviews.title: It fit great for my iPod
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something for my old iPod music and I was so excited when I found this on Amazon!! It works so great and the volume goes very loud. You can hear your music over any other loud noise. Thank you Amazon for having products that are not sold in stores anymore! You have made me very happy I thought I wasn't going to be able to listen to my favorite music again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: We use this a lot. It doesn't allow us to plug our phones in with their cases on, but has a cord from the back to plug it in with the headphone jack. This is nice, but doesn't charge it simultaneously. I also used this same cord to plug my laptop into it for a movie we were all watching and wasn't loud enough. The sound quality is excellent and my husband is picky about these things.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: I now have 3 of these and love them!
customer_reviews.text: I travel with one so I can have my iPod in the hotel with me. I have one in the kitchen and one in the basement so I can listen to books! (or music!) This one works great!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ross

customer_reviews.title: Unit is refurbished, may not work
customer_reviews.text: Unit did not work when arrived (DOA). Sent it back, got full refund. Seller didn't give me a hard time or anything. I really liked the old one I had, and I had hoped this one would replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: When I received this the box was open , the product was in it not damaged. When I went to put batteries in it the old batteries were still in it and carotid. Thought about returning it, but I cleaned it up and it still worked.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne petersen

customer_reviews.title: Bang for Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: This is not the perfect sound, but it is exceptional for the size and money. You can't expect miracles from a product this size, that is portable, and that costs $80. I listened to probably 10 different docks before finding this one and then ordering on Amazon. Some of the ones that cost twice as much sounded half as good. This won't fill a room with music, it is just intended to provided a little personal music that you can move about. That said, I think the bass is pretty good for its small size. Not much high end and not audiophile quality but an absolute bargain.
customer_reviews.author: MickSD77

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the quality of this product. The best speaker I have found so far for the price
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This dock has some great sound and is easy to travel with. I have an old school iPod (with no built in speakers) and have been looking for a good solid dock to play my music out loud on. There is a wall adapter included and can take batteries as well. It comes with a nice soft compact carrying case that velcros as well as a smaller one for the chord (which I use to store my iPod in). I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Doesn’t come with AC cord. Sounds really good for the moneo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't turn on + bad quality AC/DC adapter.
customer_reviews.text: I've never ever had problems with Philips products before, but..... I bought one, but it would hardly ever function correctly. The power light would come on, but no sound would come out whether I put the iPod directly on the dock or used the input feature. So I returned it to Philips and received a replacement, same problem, except now the replacement AC adapter doesn't work well (it seems too cheap). So basically the power supply doesn't always work, or will shut off by itself mid-song then come back on maybe ten seconds later, if I can ever get the product to work at all! I generally like Philips, but this product needs some major improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: What a great ipod dock!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but positive things to say about this speaker. I have used it at another friends house and loved it, so when I saw it on amazon, for a DRASTICALLY reduced price, I HAD to have it. It has great sound, is lightweight and extremely easy to operate. It also charges your Ipod, Iphone or Itouch while in use. The only difference that I've noticed between my friends and mine is that her speaker can operate on battery only too, almost as if when its plugged in, the speaker is 'charged'.... NBD I love it and didn't pay what she did! =)
customer_reviews.author: SKib513

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Granted, it's an old model, but so are my Ipods. Very good sound for the size. Have used with cord, not batteries. Tends to tilt back when Ipod is docked, so I stuck something under it to stabilize it.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, Not Good
customer_reviews.text: This speaker dock is made for confined workspaces such as office cubicals, tollbooths, etc. In other words, it's decent if you have no intention of turning up the sound since the audio quality is seriously lacking depth and the "bass boost" is only moderately better than your average stock computer or television speaker. Turned up high the depth of sound becomes God awful. So if audio quality is a concern then I highly recommend the Logitech S715i Portable which (while more expensive) does everything the Philips Fidelio SBD7500 does but with considerably better sound.
customer_reviews.author: Maeljin Incarna

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it every day. For someone who grew up with the big stereo...receiver and speakers and tape deck etc....I'm always impressed with how much sound and clarity I get from this item from Philips.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Better than a bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to find this older product for iPhone 4. It sounds great and provides an instant visual / info of songs being played ( compared to a streaming Bluetooth speaker). Great sound, and puts my old iPhone4 to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Williams

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: So glad to find a speaker for my old iPod Nano 2nd gen. Sound quality is only OK, but since I'm hard of hearing doesn't matter to me. Very easy to use and move around the house. Perfect for those times I don't want to wear the earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: crprotea

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday. Out of the box it played music, but did not charge the iPhone while it was docked. Speaker quality was not so great either, fuzzy/staticky sounding, but we would probably have kept it if it charged the phone like it was supposed to. Returning it for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Product came with missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, but it came from amazon with missing parts. Amazon's custumer service were excellent and they responded fast and to my full satisfaction refounding the full cost of the article. As I live in Brasil, I still nedeed to pay taxes and importation rates that are not refoudable, but that's no amazon's fault. Hopefully I will be able to purchase the missing part here in Brasil.
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful iPhone speaker. It has great sound and is loud enough to use at a party. I hooked it up at my Halloween party and listened to pandora all night. I will definitely be using it again for future functions. I was super impressed and am very happy that I chose this product . I highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Marti420

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Great sound from so small a device. It works great on my office desk: Not too large or noticeable, has decent sound and easy to use. Great price too.Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Malagarie

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker. IN a world of everything being wireless, I just wanted a good old fashioned powered portable speaker so we could play our ipods by the pool. This is great. Not super loud but we still hear the music over the kids splashing around.
customer_reviews.author: Mokie Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Works great..
customer_reviews.text: Works great... looks good ... great price ... excellent seller! I have to say at first I was skeptic to buy a used item, but this was so worth it ..
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he loves it. Sound quality is great. We have a pretty decent sized living room and the sound fills the room. Neither of us are tech nerds so I can't speak to much else except that we are completely satisfied with this speaker and it meets our needs.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: I had purchased one years ago and loved it-- it lasted forever
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy !!! The battery will not hold a charge. I bought 2 of these and neither will hold a charge. I had purchased one years ago and loved it-- it lasted forever. Wish I hadn't wasted my money on these.
customer_reviews.author: minnesota_mom_of_3girls

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is perfect for our give years old's room (we play music for her at bedtime). The bonus is that it charges the iPod too so we were able to eliminate that cord from her room. The travel case is great for when we go on trips. This is going to last her a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Thames14

customer_reviews.title: Love listening to my jams
customer_reviews.text: Love listening to my jams. Great depth of sound. I love this thing. Can finally listen to my music at a better depth than my laptop could offer. My music is finally free!!
customer_reviews.author: queenie3_00

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ahhh The Sound. I work in a warehouse so radio reception is out of the question. I put My IPod in this and grove all day long. The fact that it is portable is a bonus. Great for picnics and just sitting on the porch at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than it sounds
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a small, inexpensive sound-dock for wife's office. The styling is spot-on but the sound is thin and tinny. If you're looking for a sleek, small box to give some background sounds this is great. if you want good sound from a small box then keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.  Either spend less or spring a little extra $$$ for a better one
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I thought I would try it. This is used in an office and no matter what volume level is chosen, there is more static than sound. Not worth the price. I will be purchasing a new one of much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: breezy0408

customer_reviews.title: It works...no complaints!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 16 yr old son to have a place to charge his ipod and listen to music without blowing his ipod speakers and he has no complaints except the battery thing...however thanks to all the previous reviews I knew there was an AC adapter in the box that he didn't see...Heeellloooo just plug it in! =)
customer_reviews.author: Tantanic

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good. Sound is awesome and can get pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. Sound is awesome and can get pretty loud. I use it for my daughter's room to play music to put her to sleep, so I don't pay it that loud, but we tried it out other than that and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Millard

customer_reviews.title: Great for white noise
customer_reviews.text: Sounds really good. I am a night shifter and plug in my old iPod to sleeping music. This is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: GBPackerFan

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my I-pod Nano
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much. I'm usually up early around 5 or 6 am and have this playing low in our living room while I read until everyone is up
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality! Having such high quality speakers and also a dock that charges my phone is something I didn't think was real. I was content with having to take care of the two separately. But then I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Cox

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The sound is famous. I appreciate that I can play tunes from my iPod while it is charging on this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: love this.
customer_reviews.text: love this ..... great quality... great price! and I love that I can keep the cover on my iPod while it plays!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: BUT IT ENDED UP WORKING WITH MY ORIGINAL BLACK IPOD AND FOR THAT I AM HAPPY WITH IT
customer_reviews.text: THE LISTING SHOULD MENTION THAT THERE IS SOME DOWNLOADING OF APS INVOLVED, ETC. BUT IT ENDED UP WORKING WITH MY ORIGINAL BLACK IPOD AND FOR THAT I AM HAPPY WITH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Squarepeg27

customer_reviews.title: SENSATIONAL!!!
customer_reviews.text: POWERFUL speakers in a small and compact size. I've heard full home sound systems that don't have the clear sound quality and power that the Philips Fidelio SBD7500 Speaker Dock has. GREAT!!! Stop looking at other speakers and get the best!
customer_reviews.author: Ben and Carri

customer_reviews.title: Weak tin like sound (where is the bass
customer_reviews.text: Weak tin like sound (where is the bass?), better to spend the money on head phones. But for $ 35.00 what do you expect?
customer_reviews.author: Wild Duck

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice small speaker/charger for older style iPods and iPhones. Very good deal at clearance sale price.
customer_reviews.author: Island Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Really like it. Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Received in a timely manner. Really like it. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Ellynl123

customer_reviews.title: Solid sound and one of the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. The first lasted years before falling apart. The first thing then went was the power adapter. The cord pulls out of the wall plug and the wires are exposed. Possible fire hazard. I contacted the manufacture and the replacement plug was as much as a new unit. Replaced the unit and the new plug did the same thing in a matter of weeks. On batteries, the sound couldn't be beat. Solid sound and one of the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: frank gill

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Little tough to get my I Pad on clip though.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D.

customer_reviews.title: I initially loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved this product, but within 5 months it went dead and could not be revived. Customer support had no answer except to send me a refurbished exchange.
customer_reviews.author: rog

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker for home, office or traveling. Sound quality is good. No issues with iPod connection or use of speaker controls with iPod.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moran

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality isn't amazing and it seems like it takes a long time ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok. The sound quality isn't amazing and it seems like it takes a long time to charge my iphone. Not bad for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great and we are very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have been very please with this little iPod dock. We no longer have to run the computer all day to listen to music. We have it at a central location in our house so we can hear it all over. The sound is great and we are very pleased with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, but keep it plugged in...
customer_reviews.text: Dismayed by the battery drain design flaw (read the other reviews), but sound quality is quite good and the unit packs well for travel. If only Phillips had fixed the battery drain problem before they released it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Overall it is fine for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I get some feedback on certain songs, that kind of is a bummer. Overall it is fine for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. H.

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: The description stated it worked with all Apple 30 pin iPods. I have 3 and tried all 3 but no sound came out of the dock. Very disappointing after reading the reviews about the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: No where near what I was expecting. Not well made and lacking in some features but in a pinch it will work. Would I buy another one? No. Would I tell someone else to purchase this? No.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bockenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Can't use with a case on the device. Sound is decent. Nothing more than a speaker.
customer_reviews.author: mbourne*85

customer_reviews.title: Would get 5 stars if port was aligned right!
customer_reviews.text: This product has amazing sound and would have gotten a 5 star rating if the port dock was aligned right! I had to stick a piece of plastic behind port to bring it out so ipod touch 4g would slide down properly!
customer_reviews.author: get it right!

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: It sound is ok but it dosent stand up on it's own, I have to have it lean against a wall or prop it up w. a book.
customer_reviews.author: jenguin

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy
customer_reviews.text: When my iHome finally died we needed something in the baby's room to play white noise. Picked a mid-priced speaker and it works great! Easy to use and does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie W

customer_reviews.title: Got this for myself and a dock to enjoy podcast, 2 weeks went by and the speaker ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for myself and a dock to enjoy podcast, 2 weeks went by and the speaker popped and it sounds crackly. It's unfortunate because looks nice comes with a nice case but without listening to anything more then people talking there is no way a speaker should pop that way.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price! Just what I needed to play my iPod music and listen to Pandora. A great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Marty's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not available in stores
customer_reviews.text: Blast from the past? We could not find one at the store- but this model is not as sturdy as the previous one.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality in a smaller speaker dock
customer_reviews.text: The sound is a very good quality. Had it about six weeks and use it almost daily. I usually use the 'bass boost' option because I personally prefer that sound. My son likes that the design allows us to dock our iPad, and so do I. Great value that I hope lasts for many years longer than the other speaker dock I had (was a different brand).
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I recommend the speakers
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these speakers. I use them in rooms about 250sq ft each and they sound great. The only thing bad I have to say is that even when you turn off the speaker, the iPod continues to charge. I guess it only shuts off power to volume controls.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Great for my office!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my office. It was very important to me that I find a dock that also charged my iPhone, as I have terrible reception at work and my phone was constantly dying. I haven't tested the speaker at a loud volume yet (since I use it at work, it is on very low), but this works beautifully for low level music. The app that you can download to use with it works very nicely and has an easy user interface. The design is attractive and sleek. I haven't used it without the AC cord yet, so I can't comment on the battery life. I'm considering purchasing a second one to have at home. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for something to listen to and charge my iphone at the same time. After searching on the internet I found this and it's perfect the size of this unit makes it perfect to take anywhere, I haven't taken out to try in on new batteries (patio only so far)I played it on used rechargeable batteries and the volume seemed to decrease some (used rechargeables) But so far I have no complaints, for the price this Speaker Dock is JUST RIGHT!
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: great sounding speaker
customer_reviews.text: great sounding speaker! I don't use it as much any more simply because I don't have an iPhone but - it does really have a good, loud, full sound
customer_reviews.author: Meenchie82

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work with my 4th Gen iPod Touch
customer_reviews.text: The sound was ok with my iPhone 4S but I bought this for my 4th gen iPod touch and I couldn't get it to work so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Paulson

customer_reviews.title: AVERAGE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Nano, generation 6 which is compatible. Pros: small, battery option so it is portable Cons: could not crank the volume up loud enough (may just be me??)
customer_reviews.author: love to read

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for a small device and such a great price. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: works great! it comes with a carrying case that can ...
customer_reviews.text: works great! it comes with a carrying case that can hold my ipod. i have kept it plugged in and have not used batteries yet but it does have that option
customer_reviews.author: jennette lawley

customer_reviews.title: nice and portable
customer_reviews.text: This fits all my requirement, nice and portable, good sound and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! Fits our (much) older model iPod and is very sleek and nice-looking in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Touchy connector
customer_reviews.text: Otter case? Won't work. Bought extension and things seem rather touchy. My wife ends up not using it. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lowe

customer_reviews.title: It does not work with batteries. I have tried ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not work with batteries. I have tried several sets of batteries. Still doesn't work must use with power cord.
customer_reviews.author: Kjirsiti Bagley

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Works easily and well. Good sound. Only complaint is I was told if you leave the batteries in while attached to a charger, it still draws down the batteries. This speaker was much, much cheaper than anything else, and does the job. It is a little big for travel, so I only use it at home. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E. C. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: i was hoping for better sound and a bit louder
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and I love how compact it is. It even came with a neoprene style carry case.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Obsoletely perfect
customer_reviews.text: It works great with my iPod and is equally obsolete. The sound is very respectable for its size and is perfect for a cruise ship cabin. Too bad they stopped making them.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Fudd

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my desk at work. Very clean looking and does not take up much space. Great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Cindco

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: some of the best sound quality i have heard from a dock. Very sleek and classy, also very easy to operate and user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: levi

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works well but isn't very loud. It seems a little muffled in sound too.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Schaut

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift, it works well and was greatly appreciated
customer_reviews.author: Sorceress052

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY GOOD LITTLE SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: I GOT IF FOR CHEAP USED AND IT WORKS LIKE A CHARM. IT PRETTY LOUD AND VERY PORTABLE. MY ONLY REAL GRIPE IS IT DRAINS THE BATTERIES EVEN WHEN ITS OFF.I WOULD HAVE GAVE 5 STARS IF IT DIDN'T EAT BATTERIES AND, FOR THE RETAIL PRICE IT COULD HAVE CAME WITH A REMOTE.
customer_reviews.author: mongo lee

customer_reviews.title: Love these speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected... Great sound easy to use and the right size to place any where in the house. I would definitely recommend this to all my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: A. McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker System!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Great sound quality. Almost as good as Bose!!! Excellent price for the quality. Love the travel case that comes with it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Teare

customer_reviews.title: i pod speaker dock
customer_reviews.text: excellent sound and value. Many available but there is nothing wrong with this. Smaller would be nice but sound may be sacrificed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: but I guess it's good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be louder...but I guess it's good for the money....
customer_reviews.author: Deon H2os

customer_reviews.title: WONDERTFUL SPEAKERSET
customer_reviews.text: WE REALLY LIKE THE GREAT SOUND AND PORTABILITY OF THIS UNIT. WE LISTEN TO PUBLIC RADIO EVERY MORNING FROM MINNEAPOLIS AND CHICAGO EVEN THOUGH WE LIVE IN CENTRAL FLORIDA VIA OUR IPHONE 4. GREAT THAT IT CHARGES THE IPHONE WHILE YOU ARE LISTENING TO MUSIC. GREAT UNIT FOR US.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Mcneil

customer_reviews.title: And the beat goes on
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift to my daughter for Christmas and she was well pleased with the quality and size.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bass!
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is smaller than it seems on the pictures. But it really stands out with the sound! The bass is soooo nice. There is a switch on the top to enable more bass, but that feature is more for when you have the speaker on low volume. It has a cool case, so you can take it anywhere without worrying about scratches and what not. Anyways, buy it, use it, and love it.
customer_reviews.author: M.M

customer_reviews.title: Buy the circular radio clock Phillips instead!!
customer_reviews.text: This speak is only okay, and for the price, isn't worth it! I bought the circular ipod dock with the clock and it produces better sound than this :( Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Elysia

customer_reviews.title: Great value, looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works great! Looks great and has very good sound

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, convenient
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought one of these years ago. Great sound, convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Jones

customer_reviews.title: awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: this speaker has more bang than you think. its really loud and holds ipad well. it also has aux cable for other devices.
customer_reviews.author: ernest j castro II

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dock
customer_reviews.text: It's very small, very portable, the sound is great-much better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Krahling

customer_reviews.title: Music To Mine Ears
customer_reviews.text: Perfect item for my office. Nothing satisfies like music in the workplace. This device creates good quality sound in a relatively compact design.
customer_reviews.author: musicmatters42

customer_reviews.title: What a pile of poo
customer_reviews.text: I had this little sucker for about 18 months and it never worked right.I wanted it for use when outside ,camping and the like.It would burn through batteries at a rate of knots and also drain them when it was off so you had to use new batteries every time you came to use it.As a piece of technology it was as frustrating as anything I've ever used. It lokks good and sounds OK , distorts at medium to loudish volume,not an outdoor type. I finally discus threw it from a great height on the last camping trip because it refused to work and we were left with no tunes.Dont buy it.
customer_reviews.author: limeyk

customer_reviews.title: This is truly awesome. The Sound is great and the batteries last ...
customer_reviews.text: This is truly awesome. The Sound is great and the batteries last a long time. We love to take it to the Lake on the boat..
customer_reviews.author: KY Bird Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great system, Good size
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews... However, this product is well made, aesthetically pleasing and loud enough. If you have an iphone 4 it will prompt to download an app which allows you to have a clock, alarm, temp etc. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Darius

customer_reviews.title: It's so simple!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for a very old iPod (with no internet/wireless connectivity). It's limited, but I love it's simplicity even though I know it will be obsolete technology even for me sometime in the future...
customer_reviews.author: Debby Gardner

customer_reviews.title: small, reliable and good sound
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and compact design, with a good sound quality. Very light as well. Overall a good purchase. Much better than my last iPod speaker that lasted only one summer...
customer_reviews.author: Juan VALENZUELA

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The design of this product is not great. It has a "foot" which extends from the back, but it does not extend far enough to support very well. Waking up in the morning, I'd reach to turn off my iPhone alarm and the whole thing would fall over. Sound reproduction was ok, but needs better support.
customer_reviews.author: MasterMarquette

product_meta.title: Philips Fidelio SBD7500 30-Pin iPod/iPhone Speaker Dock (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingPhilips Sbd7500/37 Ipod/Iphone Portable Speaker Dock (Personal Audio / Stereo Systems & Boomboxes)

AMAZON.COM



 Designed for music-lovers on the go, the Philips docking speaker is a high-fidelity, highly-portable speaker for your iPod or iPhone. The speaker features a slim, elegant profile that neatly fits into any briefcase or bag. Bass-enhancing technologies ensure a powerful listening experience at home or on the go. The docking speaker also supports Philips' DockStudio app, which unlocks additional features, such as custom alarms and sound settings.





PHILIPS DOCKING SPEAKER FOR IPOD & IPHONE
AT A GLANCE:

 * Neodymium speaker provides optimum bass response and pure, balanced audio
 * DBB preserves low tones for deep bass at any volume
 * wOOx technology provides rich, precise bass without distortion
 * Shielding technology blocks mobile phone interference






Compact and portable, the docking speaker delivers mind-blowing sound wherever life takes you.



The slim, attractive design is combined with a powerful bass that doesn't compromise sound integrity. View larger.

NEODYMIUM CONSTRUCTION FOR RICH, BALANCED SOUND
 The Philips docking speaker has been engineered to deliver crisp, detailed sound that will satisfy even the most attentive listeners. Thanks to its neodymium magnets, the speaker is able to produce pure sound with superior bass response. Highs, mids, and lows are all rendered in exquisite detail, so you can hear your music as it was meant to be heard.

BASS-ENHANCING TECHNOLOGIES FOR BOOMING AUDIO
 Unlike some sound systems that swallow up the high and mid ranges when you turn up the bass, the docking speaker delivers powerful bass while still preserving fidelity. The speakers use Philips' proprietary wOOx technology to produce clean, undistorted bass. With wOOx, you can enjoy deep bass while still hearing all the details in your music.

 If you prefer your music with even more kick, you can activate Dynamic Bass Boost (DBB) with the touch of a button. DBB helps emphasize the bass content of music, allowing you to feel the 'thump' of the bass even when the volume is low. The result is a richer, more robust sound at all volumes.

DESIGNED TO GO PLACES
 An International Consumer Electronics Show 2010 Innovations honoree, the docking speaker sports a slim design that can comfortably fit into a briefcase or backpack. It can run on either battery or AC power, giving you power options for anywhere you go. And thanks to the included carrying case, you can transport the speaker anywhere without worry.

FREE DOCKSTUDIO APP UNLOCKS ADDITIONAL FEATURES
 If you own an iPod Touch or an iPhone, you can unlock even more features for your speaker using the complementary DockStudio app. This exclusive app allows you to navigate your music collection more easily and control sound settings. It also gives you access to Digital Sound Control, which lets you fine-tune your speaker to suit your acoustic preferences. You can even use the app to set customized music alarms, so you'll wake up to your favorite music every morning.

DOCK ANY IPHONE OR IPOD, EVEN IN ITS CASE
 The speaker's spring-loaded docking port accommodates any iPhone or iPod, without special adaptors. What's more, it works even when most protective cases are on--just dock your iPhone or iPod as is for fuss-free enjoyment of your music.

COMPATIBILITY AND WARRANTY INFORMATION
 The speaker is compatible with iPod; iPod touch; iPod touch 2nd generation (8/16/32 GB), 3rd gen and 4th gen; iPod nano 1st through 6th generations; iPod 5th generation; iPod classic; iPod mini; iPod with color display; and all iPhone models. 

 The Philips docking speaker is backed by a limited one-year warranty. 

ABOUT PHILIPS
 Philips has a brand promise of "sense and simplicity" that encapsulates their commitment to understanding and catering to the desires and needs of consumers. By putting end users front and center, Philips creates products designed around people's needs and aspirations that are both comprehensive and easy to use. With 60,000 registered patents, Philips is a global leader and receives numerous international design awards every year.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 Philips docking speaker for iPod & iPhone (SBD7500), AC adaptor, neoprene carrying case, 3.5-millimeter auxiliary cable, and user manual.
feature_bullets: Compatible with all iPod products with a 30-pin connector (except iPod shuffle)--this includes the newest iPod nano and touch models; also compatible with iPhone, iPhone 3G and 3GS, and iPhone 4
Plug and play to enjoy your music at home or on the go
Deep, rich bass through the built in wOOx bass radiator and Dynamic Bass Boost technology
